main event: A civilian couple observed a greenish-red light in Phoenix, Arizona.
interesting points: The light was stationary and emitted no sound,The sighting lasted between 10 to 15 minutes,The couple was observing the light from the ground,Weather conditions were clear with visibility over 30 miles,The observation was made on February 2 at 8:00 AM MST.
sighted object: a greenish-red light in the sky
witness description: a civilian man and his wife
